import { useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Navbar, Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Dropdown, Container, } from "react-bootstrap"; import NewsList from "./Components/NewsList"; function App() { const [category, setCategory] = useState(""); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const handleCategoryClick = (cetegory) => { setCategory(cetegory); setSearchTerm(""); }; const handleSearch = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setCategory(""); setSearchTerm(event.target.search.value); }; return ( <> News App
